channel.title: Forum Mafia - Enemy Within (illuminati disgracefully won)
channel.description:
## [color=green]Welcome to Forum Mafia game[/color] [color=red]Enemy[/color] [color=green]Within[/color]
[Color=steelblue][I]The year is 2027, United Nations have formed anti-terrorism coalition called UNATCO to battle against terrorist groups across the globe. 25 years later however...National Secessionist Forces or also known as NSF have commited raid against UNATCO headquarters but failed to take out entire commanding structure and are hiding among us as loyal and obedient. Unfortunately for us, the top agent of UNATCO have defected from our cause and present hazardous danger to us so it is your job to apprehend the NSF terrorists and neutralize the agent.[/i][/color]
## Rules
This is just a game, do not harass the players in any way Avoid discussing harmful contents Do not post during night phases No editing on your posts unless you want to fix your spelling. No post deleting Guide the new players with patience
## Gameplay
Day hours will be 72 hours long Night hours will be 24 hours long Actions will be done by messaging me NSF Night chat will be done through Discord The game is over when either UNATCO, NSF or Neutral Class have won. NSF uses faction kills, one member is limited to perform the kill per 1 night. There can be only 1 Mayor, 1 Leader and 1 Neutral
## Executions
To accuse someone say "/Accuse [Player]" or "Vote [Player]" with pinging my name @Frostwolf103 by typing "@" Frostwolf103, this way I can keep track on the votes. The trial commences with majority have reached, you cannot vote guilty or pardon until then. The player that is on trial must post defense within 12 hours or the trial proceed to voting stage To give verdict, use "/Guilty" or "/Pardon" with pinging my name as before.
## Special mechanics (Warning: Contains bastard game elements)
Trials will not pause the timer of the day Players that got verdicted with majority of guilty votes will not get executed, but they will be send to holding cells and interrogated to reveal their flip by next day. Players that got jailed receive Jail Chat in Discord however they are out of the game. Players that got killed will flip their faction and class immediately. Journals will not be displayed when the player get executed or killed. NSF have destroyed the armory on UNATCO's headquarters thus abilities are limited to use Total limit of same UNATCO class is 4
## To Join
To join, simply express interest in joining by saying something like “I want to join” or “/join” or “/in” or “sign me up, coach” or whatever you want
## Rolelist:
**[color=red]NSF Leader NSF Goon NSF Goon NSF Goon[/color]** **[color=green]UNATCO Chief UNATCO Professor UNATCO Troop UNATCO Specialist UNATCO Janitor Random UNATCO Random UNATCO Random UNATCO Random UNATCO Random UNATCO Random UNATCO[/color]** **[color=grey]Neutral[/color]**
>## [color=green]UNATCO Chief[/color] > **[color=green]Mayor Class[/color]** **The Diplomatic Face of UNATCO (Passive)** - Your votes counts as two **Ops Bonus (Night)** - You reward the player for hard work, they gain one use for their ability. _Your objective is to eliminate all NSF terrorists and rogue agent if necessary_
>## [color=green]UNATCO Troop[/color] > **[color=green]Vigilante Class[/color]** **Friendly Fire (passive)** - Killing UNATCO player will mark you as traitor, you lay down your weapon and commit suicide at next night **Shoot to kill (Night)** - Kill a player - 2 uses _Your objective is to eliminate all NSF terrorists and rogue agent if necessary_
>## [color=green]UNATCO Professor[/color] > **[color=green]Healer Class[/color]** **Medpack (Night)** - Heals the player from attacks - 2 uses _Your objective is to eliminate all NSF terrorists and rogue agent if necessary_
>## [color=green]UNATCO Specialist[/color] > **[color=green]Cop Class[/color]** **Bioscanner (Night)** You choose player to investigate that is under NSF list - 2 uses (NOTE: You receive 'Positive match' this player is NSF or 'Negative match' this player is not NSF) _Your objective is to eliminate all NSF terrorists and rogue agent if necessary_
>## [color=green]UNATCO Janitor[/color] > **[color=green]Citizen Class[/color]** **I do not move outta way (Passive)** - You don't have abilities _Your objective is to eliminate all NSF terrorists and rogue agent if necessary_
>## [color=red]NSF Leader[/color] > **[color=red]Godfather Class[/color]** **No criminal record (Passive)** - You will be not seen as member of NSF **Pig (Night)** - Frame the player to be seen as member of NSF - 3 uses _Your objective is to eliminate all UNATCO lackeys and rogue agent if necessary_
>## [color=red]NSF Goon[/color] > **[color=red]Goon Class[/color]** **Stay Vigilant (Passive)** - You don't have abilities _Your objective is to eliminate all UNATCO lackeys and rogue agent if necessary_
>## [color=grey]UNAUTHORIZED ENTRY DETECTED[/color] > **[color=grey]ERROR[/color]** **ACCESS DENIED** **ACCESS DENIED** _Objective removed_
## Player List 1. [s]PokemonKidRyan[/s] 2. [s]PolikShadowblizz[/s] 3. [s]Sam17z[/s] 4. [s]Insanity[/s] 5. [b]NozBugz[/b] 6. [b]Okx[/b] 7. [s]Wolfy[/s] 8. [b]Celeste_Ludenberg[/b] 9. [s]Hippolytus[/s] 10. [s]NightX[/s] 11. [b]MaximusPrime[/b] 12. [s]Lymphoma[/s] 13. [s]CaptainNerbins[/s] 14. [b]Pug[/b] 15. [b]Marluxion[/b] 16. [s]MtheJoker[/s]
## Timestamps:
Day 1 start: https://forum.imperium42.com/t/forum-mafia-enemy-within-day-1-start-16-16/52576/243 Polik's trial: https://forum.imperium42.com/t/forum-mafia-enemy-within-day-2-start-13-16/52576/753 Day 2 start: https://forum.imperium42.com/t/forum-mafia-enemy-within-day-2-start-13-16/52576/905 Sam's trial: https://forum.imperium42.com/t/forum-mafia-enemy-within-day-2-start-13-16/52576/1032 Day 3 start https://forum.imperium42.com/t/forum-mafia-enemy-within-night-2-start-12-16/52576/1090 MtheJoker's trial: https://forum.imperium42.com/t/forum-mafia-enemy-within-day-4-start-6-16/52576/1355 Day 4 start https://forum.imperium42.com/t/forum-mafia-enemy-within-day-4-start-6-16/52576/1400
## Memoir/Graveyard:
Frostwolf103 - Killed at Day 0. **[color=green]UNATCO Chief[/color]** PolikShadowbliss - Sentenced at Day 1. **[color=red]NSF Leader[/color]** Wolfy - Killed at Night 1. **[color=green]UNATCO Troop[/color]** Lymphoma - Killed at Night 1. **[color=green]UNATCO Professor[/color]** Sam17z - Sentenced at Day 2. **[color=red]NSF Goon[/color]** Insanity - Killed at Night 2. **[color=grey]Rogue Agent[/color]** Hippolytus - Killed at Night 2. **[color=red]NSF Goon[/color]** CaptainNerbins - Killed at Night 2 **[color=green]UNATCO Specialist[/color]** MtheJoker - Sentenced at Day 3. [color=green]UNATCO Specialist[/color] PokemonKidRyan - Killed at Night 3. [color=green]UNATCO Specialist[/color] NightX - Killed at Night 3. [color=green]UNATCO Janitor[/color]
Conspiracy rewards goes to PokemonKidRyan and Okx PokemonKidRyan - Calls Marl a Illuminati Chief, he's right. Okx discovers the true nature of this Forum Game.
